name: UpdateClickupSpace
description:
Update space attributes in ClickUp.

Use this tool to rename a ClickUp space, change its color, and enable or disable ClickApps for it. Call this when you need to modify the settings of an existing space.

parameters.name: space_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ClickUp space to be updated.

parameters.name: space_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the new settings for the space. Includes name, color, privacy settings, admin management, multiple assignees, and feature settings.

admin_can_manage.description: ***Note:** Allowing or restricting admins from managing private Spaces using `"admin_can_manage"` is an [Enterprise Plan](https://clickup.com/pricing) feature.*

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

admin_can_manage.description: ***Note:** Allowing or restricting admins from managing private Spaces using `"admin_can_manage"` is an [Enterprise Plan](https://clickup.com/pricing) feature.*

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
